testimonials.title: What our customers say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what parking professionals are saying about ParkSmart.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: ParkSmart has revolutionized our parking operations. The real-time monitoring and analytics have increased our efficiency by 40% and significantly improved customer satisfaction.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.content: The integration was seamless and the support team was exceptional. We've seen a 60% reduction in parking disputes and our revenue has increased by 25%.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.content: Managing multiple parking locations used to be a nightmare. Now with ParkSmart's centralized dashboard, I can oversee everything from one place. It's been a game-changer.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ParkSmart. Can't find the answer you're looking for? Contact our support team.

faqs.question: How quickly can I get started with ParkSmart?
faqs.answer: You can get started immediately with our 14-day free trial. Setup typically takes less than 30 minutes, and our onboarding team will guide you through the process.

faqs.question: Do you support multiple payment methods?
faqs.answer: Yes, we support all major payment methods including credit cards, mobile payments, and digital wallets. We also integrate with popular payment processors.

faqs.question: Can I manage multiple parking locations?
faqs.answer: Our platform is designed to handle multiple locations from a single dashboard. You can manage unlimited locations with our Professional and Enterprise plans.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app for users?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide mobile apps for both iOS and Android. Users can find parking, make reservations, and handle payments directly from their mobile devices.

faqs.question: What kind of support do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer email support for all plans, priority support for Professional plans, and 24/7 dedicated support for Enterprise customers. We also provide comprehensive documentation and training materials.

faqs.question: Can I integrate ParkSmart with my existing systems?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer API access and custom integrations. Our team can help you integrate with existing property management systems, access control systems, and other business tools.
